participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Ethan is ambitious and driven, always striving for excellence in tennis. He is friendly and enjoys meeting new people.
participant_1.background: my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.

participant_2.name: Sophia Reed
participant_2.personality: Sophia is compassionate and dedicated, with a strong sense of duty towards helping others. She has a pragmatic approach to life.
participant_2.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i'm ex military. i work fulltime in a shipyard.
